verb.description: Press against (something) lightly with a piece of absorbent material in order to clean or dry it.
examples: he dabbed his mouth with his napkin
she dabbed at her eyes with a handkerchief

verb.description: Aim at or strike with a light blow.

examples: she licked a dab of chocolate from her finger

origin: Early 21st century: possibly related to dab (noun) in the sense a small portion of cannabis oil or resin.
